info.name: Tumblr - No More Special Logos
info.description:
Removes any special icons or sponsoring near the Tumblr Logo.
NEW: REMOVES FESTIVUS SPONSORING BY SEINFELD
info.additionalInfo:
When I see anything not caught by this userstyle, I will update it.

Removes:
"logo dots" such as cookie-day icon next to logo
Festivus-logo from Christmas 2014
